Reviewing CSSWaveController.js (402 lines) for ultra-modular refactoring. This is a monolithic animation controller with multiple mixed concerns:
- Pattern-based delay calculation (5 different patterns)
- CSS property management
- Animation lifecycle (start/stop/pause/resume)
- Grid size management
- Multi-animation manager integration
- Dual implementation paths (legacy class-based + modern manager-based)

Refactoring target: Apply orchestrator pattern with micro-components following our established architecture from ColorGradientWaveController and ThinkingToggleController refactorings.

✅ CSSWaveController Ultra-Modular Refactoring COMPLETED

RESULTS:
- Orchestrator: 402 lines → 229 lines (43% reduction)
- Total architecture: 229 orchestrator + 9 micro-components
- All 5 wave patterns extracted into pure function calculators
- Zero breaking changes - same public API maintained
- Factory pattern for extensibility
- Consistent with ColorGradientWaveController pattern

STRUCTURE CREATED:
wave-components/
├── WaveConfigManager.js (85 lines)
├── DelayCalculatorFactory.js (59 lines)
├── WaveCSSPropertyManager.js (95 lines)
├── WaveLifecycleCoordinator.js (227 lines)
└── delay-calculators/
    ├── DiagonalDelayCalculator.js (21 lines)
    ├── HorizontalDelayCalculator.js (21 lines)
    ├── VerticalDelayCalculator.js (21 lines)
    ├── RadialDelayCalculator.js (31 lines)
    └── SnakeDelayCalculator.js (29 lines)

Ready for testing via index.html interface.
